item.description:
SPECIAL ONE NIGHT ONLY TRIVIA NIGHT. Join me and Boston Event Guide for a special Trivia Night next Thursday, May 31st @ 7pm, sponsored by Jim Beam. Details below. The prizes are awesome! But you MUST be present for the entire trivia game to be eligible for the Grand Prize. PLEASE ONLY RSVP if you are sure you will attend and FULLY READ the rules and information below. Please disregard the request to RSVP with Boston Event Guide. I will RSVP our entire group.

Kings is located on Dalton Street just off Boylston. It is within walking distance of the Green Line (Hynes Convention Center OR Prudential) and a 10-15 min walk from the Orange Line (Mass Ave). Everyone is responsible for their own food/drinks. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN YOUR OWN SEPARATE TAB. Cross-listed with Social Fun.

=======================================================

Trivia Night presented by Jim Beam® and Rolling Stone

Thursday, May 31 at 7PM

Kings, 50 Dalton St

Boston, MA 02115

Must be 21+ to participate and attend

 

Enjoy Guilty Pleasure playing songs from Rolling Stones' 500 Greatest Songs of All Time

 

Participate with a team of up to 6 people

Questions will be based on music, bourbon, and the local Boston history

Sampling of Red Stag by Jim Beam®

Meet Fred Noe, 7th Generation Master Jim Beam® Distiller

 

Here are the prizes you can win

*Grand VIP Prize

Limo and tickets to see the Kid Rock concert at House of Blues on Friday, June 1.

Includes access to exclusive Pre-party and meet & greet with Kid Rock.

*Team must participate in all rounds to be eligible to win the Grand Prize.

2nd Place

Rolling Stone premium headphones and food

3rd Place

Rolling Stone subscriptions

Round Winners

Live Music Series T-shirts

7PM – registration for trivia game

8PM – start time of the trivia game

11PM – end of event

 

http://www.bostoneventguide.com/events/jimbeamtrivia.htm
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and will try to get tables reserved for us.
item.name: Trivia Night Presented by Jim Beam and Rolling Stone
